Title: Bomb Patrol Afganistan
Actors: Josh Duhamel, Brad Penley, Brendan Schmutte, Chase Holzhauer, Jeremy Stein, John Groat, Matt Rayl, Sam Durham
Plot: This documentary follows the Afghan mission of the U.S Navy's Explosive Ordnance Disposal Mobile Unit during their deployment in 2011, hunting down IEDs and disposing or detonating them. All of their missions included a camera crew, which became an integral part of the mission on several occasions.
